document_data.name: H'Cathan Doom Radish
document_data.mainbody: '''H'Cathan doom radishes''' were a type of vegetable that grew on the planet [[H'Catha]]. They were considered a savory food and were particularly enjoyed by the [[githyanki]].
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], crates of H'Cathan doom radishes were stored in [[Stardock]] for the consumption of the githyanki population of Cr√®che K'liir. They were regularly brought to the station by trading [[spelljammer]]s and githyanki [[astral ship]]s.
